data.title: Roland Hanna discography
data.text:
Easy to Love: The Piano Of, Roland Hanna, 1959, ATCO

Tracks : The Best Things In Life Are Free, Next Time You See Me, From This Day On, Like Someone In Love, Yesterday, Farouk Thelonious, It Never Entered My Mind, Easy To Love, Night In Tunisia

Musicians : Roland Hanna, Ben Tucker, Roy Burnes

Sir Elf: Solo Piano, Roland Hanna, 1973, Choice

Tracks : Yours Is My Heart Alone, Night Of My Nights, You Took Advantage Of Me, Killing Me Softly With His Song, There Is No Greater Love, Morbning, Walkin', Bye Bye Blackbird

Musicians : Roland Hanna

Appears to have been released with two different front covers. Uncertain if one cover is a later reissue. CD release is 2009 has bonus tracks and yet another cover (see separate entry)

Perugia: Live At Montreux '74, Roland Hanna, 1975, Arista Freedom AL 1010

Tracks : Take The A Train, I Got It Bad And That Ain't Good, Time Dust Gathared, Perugia, A Child Is Born, Wistful Moment

Musicians : Roland Hanna

Released on Freedom in Europe and Arista Freedom in the US,

24 Preludes Book 1, Roland Hanna, 1976, Salvation GP-3072

Tracks : Prelude No. 1 In B Flat Major, Prelude No. 2 In G Major (Blue, Green, Brown And Black), Prelude No. 3 In B Minor, Prelude No. 4 In C Minor (München), Prelude No. 5 In D Minor, Prelude No. 6 In D Major (Round Robin), Prelude No. 7 In A Minor (El Toro And The Geisha), Prelude No. 8 In F Major, Prelude No. 9 In F Sharp Minor (After Paris: Tribute To Coleman Hawkins), Prelude No. 10 In E Major (Small Red Piano), Prelude No. 11 In F Sharp Minor, Prelude No. 12 In E Minor (Humming Bird)

Musicians : Roland Hanna, George Mraz

24 Preludes Book 2, Roland Hanna, 1977, Salvation GP-3154

Tracks : Prelude No. 13 In E Minor (Song Of The Black Knight), Prelude No.14 In C Minor, Prelude No. 15 In E Major (To Ramona), Prelude No. 16 In B Flat Major, Prelude No. 17 In D Flat Major, Prelude No. 18 In D Flat Major (Lockriam Mode), Prelude No. 19 In A Minor, Prelude No. 20 In D Minor, Prelude No. 21 In E Flat Major, Prelude No. 22 In A Flat Minor (Goryoaku), Prelude No. 23 In F Minor, Prelude No. 24 In B Flat Major

Musicians : Roland Hanna, George Mraz

Time for the Dancers, Roland Hanna, 1977, Progressive

Tracks : Cheryl, Time For The Dancers, Flight To Ann's Ville, Ode To A Potato Plant, Jed, Double Intentions

Musicians : Roland Hanna, George Mraz, Richard Pratt

Appears to be the same tracks as At Home With Friends below.

At Home With Friends, Roland Hanna, 1977, Progressive

Tracks : Cheryl, Time For The Dancers, Flight To Ann's Ville, Ode To A Potato Plant, Jed, Double Intentions

Musicians : Roland Hanna, George Mraz, Richard Pratt

Appears to be the same tracks as Time For The Dancers above.

Sir Elf Plus 1, Roland Hanna with George Mraz, 1978, Choice

Tracks : Yesterdays, Meeting Of The Minds, My Shining Hour, Majorca, Where's That Rainbow, What, Does It Matter?, My Heart Stood Still

Musicians : Roland Hanna, George Mraz

Reissued on CD in 2013 with two bonus tracks.

Rolandscape, Roland Hanna, 1978?, Progressive

Tracks : Orange Funk, This Can't Be Love, It's A Small World, The Interloper, It Never Entered My Mind, Thou Swell, I Didn't Know What Time It Was, Dancing On The Ceiling, My Romance

Musicians : Roland Hanna, George Mraz, Ben Riley

Appears to be the same tracks as on This Must Be Love below. Uncertain of release dates.

This Must Be Love, Roland Hanna, 1978?, Audiophile

Tracks : Orange Funk, This Can't Be Love, It's A Small World, The Interloper, It Never Entered My Mind, Thou Swell, I Didn't Know What Time It Was, Dancing On The Ceiling, My Romance

Musicians : Roland Hanna, George Mraz, Ben Riley Appears to be the same tracks as on Rolandscape above. Uncertain of release dates.

Impressions, Roland Hanna, 1979, Ahead

Tracks : I Love You, Lover Come Back To Me, Body And Soul, Impressions, The Lonely Ones, What A Difference A Day Made, Drinkin' Wine Slowly

Musicians : Roland Hanna, Major Holley, Alan Dawson

Recorded in Nice in July 1979. Subsequently released on CD by Black And Blue with bonus tracks.

Plays The Music Of Alec Wilder, Roland Hanna, 1980, Inner City

Tracks : You're Free, Moon And Sand, Mimosa And Me, Ellen, Blackberry Winter, The Starlighter, The Star Wish, It's So Peaceful In The Country, While We're Young, I'll Be Around, That's My Girl, Sounds Around The House, Remember My Child

Musicians : Roland Hanna, Helen Merrill (track 12)

Swing Me No Waltzes, Roland Hanna, 1979, SToryville

Tracks : I Hear You Knockin' But You Can't Come In - Blues, Some Kind Of Folk Song, A Little Sweetnin' For Sweden, Free Spirit - Free Style, Everything But You, Swing Me No Waltzes, Lullabye For Cedric, Anticipation, Roses Not Mums

Musicians : Roland Hanna

An expanded CD version was released in 2000 with 7 bonus tracks.

Gershwin Carmichael Cats, Roland Hanna, 1982, CTI

Tracks : Stardust, Skylark, Theme From Cats (Memory), The Nearness Of You, Oh Bess, Where's My Bess, Embraceable You

Musicians : Roland Hanna, Chet Baker (track 2), Ronnie Cuber (track 3), Don Sebesky (track 3), David Spinozza (tracks 3 & 4), Larry Coryell (tracks 1, 2 & 5), Kermit Moore (track 3), Gary King (tracks 1, 3 & 5), George Mraz, Mike Richmond (track 6), Rufus Reid (track 2), Jimmy Madison (tracks 1, 2 & 5), Peter Erskine (track 3), Sammy Figueroa (tracks 1 & 3), Vincent Taylor (tracks 1 & 3)

The Bar, Roland Hanna, 1988?, Fun House

Tracks : Stardust, Fly Me to the Moon, As Time Goes By, Days of Wine and Roses, Smoke Gets in Your Eyes, Misty, Softly, As in a Morning Sunrise, My Funny Valentine, They Say It's Wonderful, Autumn in New York, The Shadow of Your Smile, Stranger in Paradise

Musicians : Roland Hanna

When You Wish Upon a Star, Roland Hanna, 1989?, (Label?)

Tracks : When You Wish Upon a Star, Maria, Sunrise , Sunset, I've Grown Accustomed to Your Face, Can't Help Lovin' That Man, I've Never Been in Love Before, Dec. 28th, From the Bottom of My Soul, Pendulum Swings

Musicians : Roland Hanna, Ron Carter, George Mraz, Ben Riley

Uncertain of release date and label. Cover image shown may be that of a later CD reissue.

Memoir, Roland Hanna / Eiji Nakayama, 1990, Century Records

Tracks : Dancing Puppet, Souvenir Roland, One For Eiji, Seasons, Far a Way Land, Island Song, Time For the Dancers, Whirlaway

Musicians : Roland Hanna, Eiji Nakayama

Released on CD on What's New Records in 2004. The CD release has the subtitle One For Eiji.

3 For All, Roland Hanna / Bucky Pizzarelli / Jon Burr, 1996, Cymekob

Tracks : Now's the Time, All of Me, Where or When, Donna Lee, Like Grains of Sand, Nobody Said It Was Easy, Lonely House, Tricotism, 3 for All, Makin' Whoopee, We'll Be Together Again, Cherokee

Musicians : Roland Hanna, Bucky Pizzarelli, Jon Burr

Dream, Sir Roland Hanna Trio, 2001, Venues

Tracks : When I Grow Too Old To Dream, Street Of Dreams, You Stepped Out Of A Dream, Day Dream, This Time The Dream's On Me, Skylark, I Hear A Rhapsody, Dream, So In Love, Dream Dancing, Sleepin' Bee, You Do Something To Me

Musicians : Roland Hanna, Paul West, Eddie Locke

Everything I Love, Sir Roland Hanna, 2002, IPO

Tracks : Comedy Tonight, Bags: A Tribute, Lullaby Of The Leaves, I Hear A Rhapsody, You'd Be So Nice To Come Home To, Send In The Clowns, In The Blue Of The Evening, All Blues, Comes Autumn, Embraceable You, How Deep Is The Ocean, Alone Together, Everything I Love

Musicians : Roland Hanna

I've Got a Right to Sing the Blues: The Songs of Harold Arlen, Sir Roland Hanna & Carrie Smith, 2003, IPO

Tracks : Accentuate the Positive, When the Sun Comes Out, Happiness is a Thing Called Joe, Ill Wind, I've Got the World on a String, Let's Fall in Love, I've Got a Right to Sing the Blues, Blues In the Night, Stormy Weather, It's Only a Paper Moon, That Old Black Magic, Over the Rainbow

Musicians : Roland Hanna, Carrie Smith

Tributaries: Reflections on Tommy Flanagan, Sir Roland Hanna, 2004, Venus

Tracks : Sea Changes, A Child Is Born, Body and Soul, Soon, Things Ain't What They Used to Be, Never Let Me Go, The Cup Bearers, 'Tis, I Concentrate On You, Robin's Next, Delarna

Musicians : Roland Hanna

Apres Un Reve, Sir Roland Hanna, 2009, Venus

Tracks : Serenade, Après un Rêve, This Is My Beloved (Nocturne-String Quartet, No. 2), Prelude (Op. 28, No. 20), Like Grains of Sand, Melody in F, Elvira Madigan, Going Home, Based on Gustav (Symphony No. 5, 2nd Movement)

Musicians : Roland Hanna, Ron Carter, Grady Tate

Possibly released a few years earlier than the date given.

Impressions, Roland Hanna, 1990, Black And Blue

Tracks : I Love You, Lover Come Back To Me, Body And Soul, Impressions, The Lonely Ones, What A Difference A Day Made, Drinkin' Wine Slowly, All Blues, Isn't A Pity

Musicians : Roland Hanna, Major Holley, Alan Dawson, George Duvivier (track 9), Oliver Jackson (track 9)

Originally released on LP on the Ahead label in 1979. Tracks 8 and 9 are bonus tracks on the CD release.

Walkin': A Jazz Hour with, Roland Hanna, 1990, Jazz Hour

Tracks : You Took Advantage Of Me, Killing Me Softly With His Songs, There Is No Greater Love, Morning, Walkin', Perugia, A Child Is Born, Wistful Moment, Two Cute, Improvisation On Prelude In E Minor, Hallelujah

Musicians : Roland Hanna, George Mraz, Mel Lewis, Stéphane Grappelli (tracks 9 to 11)

Recordings from 1973 and 1974. Probably all previously released.

Swing Me No Waltzes, Roland Hanna, 2000, Storyville

Tracks : I Hear You Knockin' But You Can't Come In - Blues, Some Kind Of Folk Song, A Little Sweetnin' For Sweden, Free Spirit - Free Style, Everything But You, Swing Me No Waltzes, Lullaby For Cedric, Anticipation, Roses Not Mums, Love For Sale, Blue Lou, Afterglow, Blue Lilly, Miles Ahead, Autumn Leaves, Pastel

Musicians : Roland Hanna

Tracks 1 to 9 were originally released on a Storyville LP in 1980. Tracks 10 to 16 are bonus tracks on this CD release.

Sir Elf: Solo Piano, Roland Hanna, 2009, Choice

Tracks : Yours Is My Heart Alone, Night Of My Nights, You Took Advantage Of Me, Killing Me Softly With His Song, There Is No Greater Love, Morning, Walkin', Bye Bye Blackbird, Back Home in Indiana, If You Could See Me Now, This Is All I Ask

Musicians : Roland Hanna

Originally released in 1973. This CD has 3 bonus tracks.

Solo Piano Free Spirit, Roland Hanna, 2011, Storyville

Tracks : I Hear You Knockin' But You Can't Come In - Blues, Some Kind Of Folk Song, A Little Sweetnin' For Sweden, Free Spirit - Free Style, Everything But You, Swing Me No Waltzes, Lullaby For Cedric, Anticipation, Roses Not Mums, Love For Sale, Blue Lou, Afterglow, Blue Lilly, Miles Ahead, Autumn Leaves, Pastel, Where Or When, I Got It Bad And That Ain't Good, Stompin' At The Savoy, Perugia, Prelude To A Kiss, Emaline, Don't Blame Me, Anone, Indiana, Bye Bye Blackbird, Willow Weep For Me, Isn't It A Pity, All The Things You Are

Musicians : Roland Hanna

Music originally released on the albums Swing No Waltzes and Informal Solo and possibly other sources.

Sir Elf Plus 1, Roland Hanna with George Mraz, 2013, Choice

Tracks : Yesterdays, Meeting Of The Minds, My Shining Hour, Majorca, Where's That Rainbow, What, Does It Matter?, My Heart Stood Still, How Long Has This Been Going On?, I'll Close My Eyes

Musicians : Roland Hanna, George Mraz

Tracks 1 to 7 originally released on LP in 1978.

Benny In Brussels Volume 1, Benny Goodman And His Orchestra, 1958, Columbia

Tracks : Let's Dance, Don't Be That Way, Hallelujah, Obsession, Brussels Blues, More Than You Know, The World Is Waiting For The Sunrise, Jubilee, Roll 'Em

Musicians : Benny Goodman, John Frosk, Billy Hodges, Taft Jordan, E.V. Perry, Vernon Brown, Willie Dennis, Rex Peer, Seldon Powell, Zoot Sims, Al Block, Ernie Mauro, Gene Allen, Roland Hanna, Billy Bauer, Arvell Shaw, Roy Burnes, Jimmy Rushing (track 5)

Recorded at the World Fair in Brussels in 1958. This material has been reissued in a number of different formats.

Benny In Brussels Volume 2, Benny Goodman And His Orchestra, 1958, Columbia

Tracks : Stealin' Apples, Memories Of You, Balkan Mixed Grill, Gershwin Medley: The Man I Love/Oh, Lady Be Good/Somebody Loves Me/I Got Rhythm, St. Louis Blues, Mr. Five By Five, March Of The Belgian Paratroops, One O'Clock Jump, Goodbye

Musicians : Benny Goodman, John Frosk, Billy Hodges, Taft Jordan, E.V. Perry, Vernon Brown, Willie Dennis, Rex Peer, Seldon Powell, Zoot Sims, Al Block, Ernie Mauro, Gene Allen, Roland Hanna, Billy Bauer, Arvell Shaw, Roy Burnes, Jimmy Rushing (track 2)

Recorded at the World Fair in Brussels in 1958. This material has been reissued in a number of different formats.

Early One Morning, Al Hibbler with the Roland Hanna Trio, 1964, LMI

Tracks : Believe It, Beloved, Dedicated to You, Blues for Weepers, I'm Just a Lucky So and So, Early One Morning (Prison Bound Blues), Lover Come Back to Me, You'd Be So Nice to Come Home To, The Very Thought of You, It Shouldn't Happen to a Dream, Im Gonna Sit Right Down and Write Myself a Letter, I Can't Put My Arms Around a Memory

Musicians : Al Hibbler, Roland Hanna, Richard Davis (tracks 2, 3 & 7), Bob West (other tracks), Ed Locke (tracks 2, 3 & 7), Nick Ceroli (other tracks)

Ruth Brown '65, Ruth Brown, 1965, Mainstream

Tracks : On The Good Ship Lollipop, Help A Good Girl Go Bad, He's A Real Gone Guy, Porgy, What Am I Looking For, Here's That Rainy Day, Hurry On Down, Table For Two, What Do You Know (Que Sabes Tu), Whispering Grass, Watch It, I Know Why

Musicians : Roland Hanna is a member of the large orchestra that backs Ruth Brown on this album.

Reissued by Mainstream in 1972 with the title Softly.

Presenting Joe Williams and Thad Jones / Mel Lewis, The Jazz Orchestra, 1966, Solid State SS 18008

Tracks : Get Out of My Life Woman, Woman's Got Soul, Nobody Knows the Way I Feel This Morning, Gee Baby, Ain't I Good to You, How Sweet It Is (To Be Loved by You), Keep Your Hand on Your Heart, Evil Man Blues, Come Sunday, Smack Dab in the Middle, It Don't Mean a Thing (If It Ain't Got That Swing), Hallelujah I Love Her So, Night Time Is the Right Time (to Be With the One You Love)

Musicians : Joe Williams, Thad Jones, Mel Lewis, Bill Berry, Jimmy Nottingham, Richard Williams, Snooky Young, Bob Brookmeyer, Garnett Brown, Cliff Heather, Tom McIntosh, Eddie Daniels, Jerome Richardson, Jerry Dodgion, Joe Farrell, Pepper Adams, Roland Hanna, Sam Herman, Richard Davis

The Fox And The Hounds, Eddie "Lockjaw" Davis, 1967, RCA Victor

Tracks : I Wished on the Moon, When Your Lover Has Gone, Born to Be Blue, People Will Say We're in Love, Day by Day, Bye Bye Blackbird, Call Me, This Is Always, I Remember You, Out of Nowhere

Musicians : Roland Hanna is probably a member of the big band supporting Davis on some of the tracks on this album.

The Glory Of Love, Herbie Mann, 1967, A&M SP 3003

Tracks : No Use Crying, Hold On, I'm Comin', Glory of Love, Unchain My Heart, House of the Rising Sun, The Letter, Upa, Neguinho, Love Is Stronger Far Than We, Oh, How I Want To Love You, In and Out

Musicians : Herbie Mann, Ernie Royal, Burt Collins, Benny Powell, Joe Grimaldi, Hubert Laws, Roy Glover, Paul Griffin, Roland Hanna, Jay Berliner, Eric Gale, Ron Carter, Herb Lovelle, Grady Tate, Ted Sommer, Ray Barretto, Johnny Pacheco

Love Calls, Eddie "Lockjaw" Davis, 1968, RCA Victor

Tracks : Love Is Here to Stay, When Sunny Gets Blue, If I Ruled The World, Time After Time, Just Friends, Don't Blame Me, I Should Care, The Man With the Horn, We'll Be Together Again, A Weaver Of Dreams, If I Should Lose You

Musicians : Eddie "Lockjaw" Davis, Paul Gonsalves, Roland Hanna, Ben Tucker, Grady Tate

Asphalt Canyon Suite, Kenny Burrell, 1969, Verve

Tracks : Asphalt Canyon Suite Part 1: Introduction / Asphalt Canyon Blues, Part 2: Think About It / Better Get Your Thing Together / Alone in the City, Things Ain't What They Used to Be, Put a Little Love in Your Heart, Please Send Me Someone to Love, Going to Jim and Andy's, Sugar Hill

Musicians : Kenny Burrell, Roland Hanna, plus orchestra

All The Friendly Colours, Hedge & Donna, 1969, Capitol

Tracks : The Pride Of The Rain, There's A Wheel, Jeliene, Two People, There Came A Question, Bluebird, Women And Religion, Jamie, Any Day Now

Musicians : Roland Hanna plays on at least one track of this album

Comment, Les McCann, 1970, Atlantic 1547

Tracks : How Many Broken Wings, Can't We Be Strangers Again, Unless It's You, What I Call Soul, Comment, Baby, Baby, Yours Is My Heart Alone

Musicians : Les McCann, Roberta Flack, Jimmy Owens, Joe Wilder, Richard Williams, Benjamin Powell, Dick Griffin, Seldon Powell, Richard Landry, Stanley Cowell, Roland Hanna, Junior Mance, Richard Tee, Billy Butler, Margaret Ross, Ron Carter, Billy Cobham, Donald Dean, plus a large choir on one track

Let My Children Hear Music, Charles Mingus, 1972, Columbia

Tracks : The Shoes Of The Fisherman's Wife Are Some Jive Ass Slippers, Adagio Ma Non Troppo, Don't Be Afraid, The Clown's Afraid Too, Hobo Ho, The Chill Of Death, The I Of Hurricane Sue

Musicians : Charles Mingus, Lonnie Hillyer, Joe Wilder, Snooky Young, Jimmy Nottingham, Jimmy Knepper, Bobby Jones, James Moody, Charles McPherson, Jerry Dodgion, Julius Watkins, Sir Roland Hanna, Jaki Byard, Charles McCracken, Ron Carter, Richard Davis, Milt Hinton, Dannie Richmond

CD release has one additional track (Taurus In The Arena Of Life).

Softly, Ruth Brown, 1972, Mainstream MRL 369

Tracks : On The Good Ship Lollipop, Help A Good Girl Go Bad, He's A Real Gone Guy, Porgy, What Am I Looking For, Here's That Rainy Day, Hurry On Down, Table For Two, What Do You Know (Que Sabes Tu), Whispering Grass, Watch It, I Know Why

Musicians : Roland Hanna is a member of the large orchestra that backs Ruth Brown on this album.

Originally released on Mainstream as Ruth Brown '65 in 1965.

Thad Jones And Mel Lewis, Thad Jones And Mel Lewis, 1975, BN-LA 392-H2

Tracks : Jive Samba, Mean What You Say, A Child is Born, Tiptoe, Get Out of My Life, Come Sunday, Woman's Got Soul, Groove Merchant, Big Dipper, Little Pixie, Central Park North Mornin' Reverend, You Won't Let Me Go, Fine Brown Frame, Be Anything (But Be Mine)

A double LP compilation of tracks originally released on Solid State LPs. Roland Hanna plays on most of the tracks.

Echoes of an Era: In The Vernacular, John Handy Quintet / Quartet, 1976, Roulette RE-132

Tracks : I'll Close My Eyes, First Time, Suggested Line, Problem Too, Quote Unquote, Blues In The Vernacular, Dance To The Lady, I'll Never Smile Again, To Randy, Tales Of Paradise, Boo´s Ups And Downs, Hi Number, Prettyside Avenue, No Coast

Originally released on In The Ver·nac'u·lar (1959) and No Coast Jazz (1961). Roland Hanna plays on In The Ver·nac'u·lar.

Pre Morning, Junko Mine w/ Roland Hanna Trio, 1976, Trio

Tracks : My Foolish Heart, Close Your Eyes, Everything I Have Is Yours, Sometimes I'm Happy, The Rest Of Your Life, Pre Morning, Teach Me Tonight, I'm A Fool To Want You, As Long As I Live, The River Of No Return

Musicians : Junko Mine, Roland Hanna, George Mraz, Donald Bailey

The Guitar Session, Jay Berliner, Gene Bertoncini, Toots Thielemans, Richard Resnicoff, 1977, Philips (France/Japan)

Tracks : It Don't Mean A Thing (If You Ain't Got That Swing), Without You, Penelope, Bossa Triste, Guitarus, Malaguena, I Understand, Something Simple, Nada Mas, The Search

Musicians : Gene Bertoncini, Jay Berliner, Richard Resnicoff, Toots Thielemans, Joe Newman, Frank Wess, Seldon Powell, Roland Hanna, George Duvivier, Richard Pratt

Released in the US in 1981 on Inner City.

Sophisticated Lady, Carol Sloane, 1977, Trio

Tracks : Take The "A" Train, I Let A Song Go Out Of My Heart/Do Nothin' Till You Hear It From Me, Solitude, Satin Doll, In A Sentimental Mood, It Don't Mean A Thing, Sophisticated Lady, Mood Indigo, Prelude To A Kiss, Jump For Joy, Come Sunday, Take The "A" Train

Musicians : Carol Sloane, Roland Hanna, George Mraz, Richie Pratt

Don't Go Away, Pug Horton, 1979, Bodeswell Records

Tracks : If, Breezin' Along, I Can Dream, Send A Little Love My Way, Melancholy, Don't Go Away, By Myself, Sweetheart O' Mine, I'll String Along With You, I Found A New Baby, Miss My Lovin' Time, Tipperary

Musicians : Pug Horton, Bob Wilber, Roland Hanna, Milt Hinton

By Myself, Miriam Klein, 1979, L + R

Tracks : Mean To Me, It's A Sin To Tell A Lie, Prelude To A Kiss, Lush Life, Sophisticated Lady, Something To Remember You By, By Myself, Bei Mir Bist Du Schoen, There Is No Greater Love, I'm Glad There Is You

Musicians : Miriam Klein, Roland Hanna, George Mraz

Released on CD in 2013 by Enja with a different front cover.

Aurex Jazz Festival '81, All Star Jam Session, 1981, Eastworld

Tracks : Crisis, Bernie's Tune, Song For Strayhorn, What Am I Here For, Take The "A" Train / Caravan / Things Ain't What They Used To Be, A Night In Tunisia, Time For The Dancers, The Girl From Ipanema, Bag's Groove

Musicians : Freddie Hubbard, Bob Brookmeyer, Stan Getz, Gerry Mulligan, Roland Hanna, Milt Jackson, Ray Brown, Art Blakey

You're Nearer, Nancy Harrow, 1986, Tono

Tracks : You're Nearer, Confessin' The Blues, Hello, Hallelujah! I Love Him So, Don't Go To Strangers, I Used To Love You (But It's All Over), Mean To Me, You're Not The Only Oyster In The Stew, If I could Be With You, I Don't Know You Any More, I Get Along Without You Very Well

Musicians : Nancy Harrow, Bob Brookmeyer, Sir Roland Hanna, Ray Drummond, Terri Lyne Carrington

Reissued in 1998 by Baldwin Street Music with 4 bonus tracks.

In The Mood For Swing, Benny Carter, 1989, Musical Heritage Society

Tracks : I'm In The Mood For Swing, Another Time, Another Place, The Courtship, Rock Me To Sleep, Janel, The Romp, Summer Serenade, Not So Blue, You, Only You, Blue Moonlight, South Side Samba

Musicians : Benny Carter, Dizzy Gillespie (tracks 2, 8 & 11), Roland Hanna, Howard Alden, George Mraz, Louie Bellson

This album gas been released a number of times.

Epitaph, Charles Mingus, 1990, Columbia

Tracks : Main Score, Pt. 1, Percussion Discussion, Main Score, Pt. 2, Started Melody, Better Get It in Your Soul, The Soul, Moods in Mambo, Self Portrait / Chill of Death, O.P. (Oscar Pettiford), Please Don't Come Back from the Moon, Monk, Bunk & Vice Versa (Osmotin'), Peggy's Blue Skylight, Wolverine Blues, The Children's Hour of Dream, Ballad (In Other Words, I Am Three), Freedom, Interlude (The Underdog Rising), Noon Night, Main Score, Reprise

Musicians : Randy Brecker, Wynton Marsalis, Lew Soloff, Jack Walrath, Joe Wilder, Snooky Young, Eddie Bert, Sam Burtis, Urbie Green, David Taylor, Britt Woodman, Paul Faulise, Don Butterfield, George Adams, Phil Bodner, John Handy, Dale Kleps, Michael Rabinowitz, Jerome Richardson, Roger Rosenberg, Gary Smulyan, Bobby Watson, Karl Berger, John Abercrombie, Roland Hanna, John Hicks, Reggie Johnson, Ed Schuller, Victor Lewis, Daniel Druckman

You Must Believe In Spring, Frank Morgan, 1992, Antilles

Tracks : But Beautiful, You've Changed, With Malice Towards None, Something Borrowed, Something Blue, I Should Care, Embraceable You, While The Gettin's Good Blues, My Heart Stood Still, Enigma, I Cover The Waterfront, You Must Believe In Spring, Come Sunday

Musicians : Frank Morgan, Barry Harris, Hank Jones, Kenny Barron, Roland Hanna (tracks 8 & 9), Tommy Flanagan

Portraits By Ellington, Lincoln Center Jazz Orchestra, 1992, Columbia

Tracks : Portrait Of Louis Armstrong, Thanks For The Beautiful Land On The Delta, Portrait Of Bert Williams, Bojangles, Self Portrait Of The Bean, Second Line, Total Jazz, Liberian Suite: I. I Like The Sunrise / II. Dance No. 1 / III. Dance No. 2 / IV. Dance No. 3 / V. Dance No. 4 / VI. Dance No. 5

Musicians include : Wynton Marsalis, Marcus Belgrave, Lew Soloff, Art Baron, Britt Woodman, Wycliffe Gordon, Todd Williams, Bill Easley, Michael White, Frank Wess, Norris Turney, Joe Temperley, Roland Hanna, Steve Nelson, Andy Stein, Reginald Veal, Kenny Washington, Milt Grayson

Malcolm X: The Original Motion Picture Score, Terence Blanchard, 1992, Columbia

Tracks : Opening Credits, Young Malcolm, Cops & Robbers, Earl's Death, Flashback, Numbers, Fire, Back To Boston, Malcolm Meets Baines, Black & White, Little Lamb Vision, Malcolm's Letter, Malcolm Meets Elijah, The Old Days, Betty's Theme, Fruit Of Islam, First Minister, Betty's Conflict, Malcolm Speaks To Secretaries, Malcolm Confronts Baines, Chickens Come Home, Going To Mecca, Firebomb, Assassins, Assassination, Eulogy

Musicians : Roland Hanna plays on some of the tracks of this soundtrack album

Very R.A.R.E. & Love And Peace, Elvin Jones, 1992, Konnex

Tracks : Sweet Mama, Passion Flower, Zange, Tin Tin Deo, Pitter Pat, The Witching Hour, Little Rock's Blues, Hip Jones, Korina, For Tomorrow, Sweet and Lovely, Origin

Musicians : Tracks 1 to 6: Elvin Jones, Art Pepper, Roland Hanna, Richard Davis / Tracks 7 to 12: Elvin Jones, McCoy Tyner, Pharoah Sanders, Jean-Paul Bourelly, Richard Davis

Notes : A 2-on-1 CD release. Tracks 1 to 6 were originally released on Very R.A.R.E (1980) and tracks 7 to 12 were originally released on Love And Peace (1982).

The Complete Solid State Recordings Of, Thad Jones / Mel Lewis Orchestra, 1994, Mosaic

Tracks : ABC Blues, Kids Are Pretty People, Don't Ever Leave Me, Once Around, Three And One, Balanced Scales = Justice, Willow Weep For Me, Mean What You Say, Sophisticated Lady, Willow Tree, Hawaii, The Little Pixie, A-That's Freedom, The Second Race, Willow Tree, Quietude, Bachafillen, Lover Man, Mornin' Reverend, Samba Con Getchu, Willow Tree, Don't Git Sassy, Say It Softly, Mornin' Reverend, Kids Are Pretty People, The Second Race, St. Louis Blues, The Waltz You Swang For Me, Central Park North, Jive Samba, Quietude, Big Dipper, Tow Away Zone, The Groove Merchant, Consummation, Dedication, Tiptoe, It Only Happens Every Time, Fingers, Us, A Child Is Born, Ahunk Ahunk

A 5 CD set of music recorded between 1966 and 1970 and released primarily on albums on the Solid State label. Roland Hanna plays on most of the tracks.

Jazz At Lincoln Center: They Came To Swing, Lincoln Center Jazz Orchestra, 1994, Columbia

Tracks : Take the "A" Train, Black And Tan Fantasy, Express Crossing, Light Blue, Jelly, Jelly, Things To Come, Boy Meets Horn, Lost In Loveliness, Back To Basics, Tattooed Bride

Musicians : Roland Hanna plays on some of the tracks of this collection of big band recordings made at various locations between 1992 and 1994.

Seasons, David Murray Quartet, 1998, Pow Wow

Tracks : Seasons, Spring Will Be A Little Late This Year, Spring Is Here, The Summer Knows, Indian Summer, September Song, Autumn In New York, September In The Rain, Snowfall, Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!

Musicians : David Murray, Roland Hanna, Richard Davis, Victor Lewis

One On One, Clark Terry, 2000, Chesky Records

Tracks : L.O.V.E., Just For A Thrill, Liza All The Clouds'll Roll, Intimacy Of The Blues, You Can Depend On Me, Memories Of You, Honeysuckle Rose, Willow Grove, Solitude, Blue Monk, Misty, Swingin' The Blues, Jungle Blues, Skylark

Musicians : Clark Terry, Monty Alexander, Geri Allen, Eric Lewis, Kenny Barron, John Lewis, Sir Roland Hanna, Benny Green, Barry Harris, Tommy Flanagan, Don Friedman, Billy Taylor, Junior Mance, Eric Reed, Marian McPartland

Each track is a duet between Clark Terry and a different pianist. The pianists are listed above in the order they feature on the CD.
